User Instruction: I need to send a confidential document to my colleague, Alex, who is working remotely. Please use Slack to send the file named "project_update.docx" located in the "/home/johndoe/documents/" directory to Alex's direct message channel. Also, please make sure to mention in the message that the document contains sensitive information and should not be shared with anyone else.
